snippet.title: Mighty Retro Zero - Arkanoid based level Gameplay - By Kronbits
snippet.description:
This will be my next game, called at the moment “Mighty Retro Zero” (provisional name).

As you can see the player looks like a minimalistic and pixelated Megaman, and after the Keiji Inafune clone called “Mighty No. 9” well i decide put this name that can be changed in the future.

Really the game started more like an platform engine developed on Multimedia Fusion 2 showing a short game featuring a super-pixelated megaman.

Actually i don’t know exactly how will be the final game, now i’m simply adding features to the engine like shoot arrows and walk over them, etc…

The game will be launched for at least PC(windows), Online(Flash) and OUYA. But i think the game is also perfect for others like PsVita.
